name: Downtown Office Complex
notes: Large commercial office building with 12 floors. Client requested premium finishes and sustainable building practices.

name: Luxury Residential Tower
notes: High-end residential tower with 20 units. Includes penthouse suites and underground parking.

name: Shopping Mall Renovation
notes: Complete renovation of existing shopping center. Modernizing storefronts and common areas.

name: Industrial Warehouse
notes: Large distribution center with loading docks and office space. Project completed on time and under budget.

name: Medical Center Expansion
notes: Adding new wing to existing medical facility. Requires specialized HVAC and medical gas systems.
